name: Curcuit
description:
The Nanobot B4 finds itself awakened during an accident that has left its motherboard dying. Now it must venture out in the world, and try to find a new core that must stand trial in order to replace the great light tower and bring balance once again.

It encounters the candidate core MiMi, in which it creates a physichal bond, connecting the two robots. Now they must combine their powers, to chanel and empower the environment in order for them to reach the great lighttower and fulfill the motherboard prophecy.


Reception and grading

The game was created during the Game Development course at the IT University of Copenhagen during the spring semester 2016. The game was top graded.

Members:

Programming: Patrikk Dyrberg Sørensen

Sound and Music : Jesper Kirkegaard Bendtsen

Artist & Level Designer: Jonas Jeppesen

Game Designer: Anton Forchhammer

Project Manager: Anastasios Tsiolakidis
